page.title: 09Cowers Lane Post Office
page.content:
Mr.Holbrook runs the Post Office. When he was a small boy, he went to Turnditch School. His parents went there as well.He showed us the stamps. They start at 1p and go up to Â£5.Where the Post Office is now used to be an office for a haulage firm. The lorries used to park at the back.
The Post Office has been in that particular place for 13 years. Before that,it was across the road. Monday is the quietest day and Thursday the busiest. There was a Post Office in Windley until recently.If there wasn't a Post Office here, people would have to go another two miles to Idridgehay.
